item.description:
It's a FAMILY FUN DAY. Please come support. The 6th Annual One Heart Festival will take place on Saturday, September 8th, 2012 at 661 Washington Street in Codman Square Dorchester, MA.

The One Heart Festival also known as The Codman Square Peace Concert is a FREE community event that is held annually in the Codman Square area of Dorchester to bring together Boston's diverse communities for a fun day of live entertainment, food, and shopping to promote Peace, Unity and Prosperity throughout the communities of Boston.

Come Listen to the great Multi-Cultural Sounds of Gospel, R&B, Hip Hop, African Drums, Reggae, Dancehall and more from the Commonwealth and beyond.This year's special performances include Garrisun Family, House of Deliverance, Jah-N-I Roots Band, Jah Jah Drummers, King-i, Mamadou, Princess Menen, Pete Doom, Peter Fyine, Shades, and Tony Funches (formerly of the Platters). Additional Music by 105.3 Vibe FM, D-Bass, and more.

for more info contact email 1empressk@gmail.com or call 347-926-3675
item.name: 6th Annual One Heart Festival Saturday 9/8/12
